Script.string: We're headed underneath the Sinestral Manor.
Get ready for soldiers corrupted by the vampirs and the ghosts of a thousand nightmares...
Our first targets, the duchess and the duke, are on the ground floor.
Climb the ladder out of the basement. Easy, right?
Then it gets harder. There's a secret temple in the basement-
that's where they keep the device that's been driving everyone insane.
With the duchess and the duke out of the picture,
